Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Application Insights to continuously monitor the performance of web applications hosted on Azure App Service. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks.
Verify the security settings of the web application, including HTTPS enforcement, TLS versions, and custom domain bindings. Ensure compliance with organizational security policies.
Regularly update the application frameworks and runtime versions used by the web application to ensure compatibility and security.
Schedule and verify backups of application data and configurations to ensure recovery in case of data loss or corruption.
Review and update access controls, including role-based access control (RBAC) and identity management settings, to ensure only authorized users have access.
Conduct failover tests to ensure the web application can recover quickly in case of regional outages or service disruptions.
Review and adjust scaling settings, including autoscale rules, to ensure optimal performance and cost efficiency during peak and off-peak times.
Ensure the underlying infrastructure, including the App Service plan, is patched and updated to the latest versions to mitigate vulnerabilities.
Analyze application logs for errors, warnings, and unusual activity. Use Azure Log Analytics for deeper insights and troubleshooting.
Keep documentation for the web application up-to-date, including architecture diagrams, operational procedures, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform regular penetration tests to identify vulnerabilities in the web application and its hosting environment.
Evaluate the SLA performance of Azure App Service to ensure compliance with agreed metrics. Address any deviations or concerns.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Azure App Service features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding the web application's performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
